en.content: You are beginning to get your bearings in Emberhead. Would you like to explore some more?

text.content: You may choose another option from those below. Do not repeat a previous choice. Once you have tried four options (or before that, if you are ready to move on), choose “Continue”.

zh.content: 你已经能大概摸清自己在烬头村的位置了。你想继续深入调查吗？

text.content: 你可以从以下几个选项中再选择一项。不要重复之前的选择。如果下面的选项你已经试过四个（或者在那之前，如果你打算推进时间），选择“继续”。

text.en: Ask about transport at the local general store
text.zh: 去本地杂货店询问交通方式

text.en: Walk down to the lower level and check out the eastern road
text.zh: 沿着道路下坡，查看东盘山路
调查巨大的金属建筑物

text.en: Look for local people with their own transport needs
text.zh: 寻找拥有交通工具的当地居民
